arts.ttl: Napoli Reach Agreement with Okafor as Saint-Maximin Deal Falters
arts.sum: In a surprising turn of events on the final day of the transfer window, Napoli have reached an agreement with AC Milan's Noah Okafor, potentially outmanoeuvring Atalanta in the race for the Swiss forward's signature. The post Napoli Reach Agreement with Okafor as Saint-Maximin Deal Falters appeared first on FootItalia.com.
